ygData.subject: Re: Virus spreading has NO place anywhere
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/17/99 11:12:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... This is for Spell research. If this thread continues tomorrow I will change the list to
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/17/99 11:12:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
killag@... writes:

> Is this a mailing list on flaming spammers and newbies or on sharing info on
> spell research? Tell me now so I can get off of this list if need be.
>

This is for Spell research.

If this thread continues tomorrow I will change the list to moderated for a
while. I don't like to do that, because I could only message check certain
times a day.

An apology was sent on the list, it should be over with.

I really do not want to be draconian about this... but enough is enough. And
general advice for people... please read all mails about a subject before
mailing your response, it helps keep the continuity.

Adam
